imdb.plot outline: When your parents don't approve of your spouse, is a happy life possible? Mi Xiao Mi (Li Xiao Lu) is a reporter for a Beijing news agency who meets and falls in love with Jin Liang (Wang Lei), a gynecologist. When Xiao Mi insists on marrying Liang, a "bei piao" (a non-native Beijing resident), Xiao Mi's single mother, Wang Shu Hua (Song Dan Dan), nearly has a heart attack but is forced to accept the relationship.
imdb.title: We Love You, Mr. Jin
plot: When your parents don't approve of your spouse, is a happy life possible? Mi Xiao Mi (Li Xiao Lu) is a reporter for a Beijing news agency who meets and falls in love with Jin Liang (Wang Lei), a gynecologist. When Xiao Mi insists on marrying Liang, a "bei piao" (a non-native Beijing resident), Xiao Mi's single mother, Wang Shu Hua (Song Dan Dan), nearly has a heart attack but is forced to accept the relationship.

Xiaomi, an entertainment reporter working for a newspaper office, secretly marries an accoucheur, Jin Liang, not letting her mother Wang Shuhua know about it. Wang demands Xiaomi that she should marry a Beijing boy. Knowing that her daughter has already married an accoucheur who is not a Beijing citizen, Wang has to accept it. In order not to be inferior to others, Jin Liang's father, Jin Dazhu, a miner in the northeast of China, sells the house in the hometown immediately and buys a new one in Beijing with a loan. He and the young couple live together in that new house. Since then, the young couple makes a fresh start with Jin Liang's father. Jin Dazhu's ancestor was a noble. He is strict with Xiaomi and Wang Shuhua. What's worse, Jin Liang's elder sister comes to work in Beijing. She also moves into the house. The marriage seems to be a challenge for Jin Liang. The young couple moves back to Wang's house. Jin Dazhu is very angry with that. He plays tricks in order to live in Wang's house, too. A humorous war between Jin Dazhu and Wang Shuhua has begun ever since. After a series of stories, Wang Shuhua and Jin Dazhu are reconciled with each other, understanding that the happiness of the young couple is the most important thing. Then, Jin Dazhu gives his house to Jin Ming, and goes back to his hometown. Later, Xiaomi is pregnant. They all live a happy life.
